name: [key]tosser
description:
[key]tosser is a puzzle platformer made for GMTK Jam 2020. You can only perform actions if you have the corresponding key in your inventory, but tossing them may be required. To beat the game, you may need to lose control.

Made by Ali Bhojani and Chuck Walker.

Controls

A/D - left/right movement

J - jump

C/X - cycle through currently held keys

N - throw currently equipped key

down(S)+N - pick up key

/ - restart current level
